channel.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
channel.description: What song in the Half Life series do you think is the creepiest? I'm voting for this [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4b_CxSQ3r8U&feature=related[/url]

item.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Oh wow, all the ones above.

And don’t forget this one.

It scared the fuck out of me, especially being in an old dilapidated apartment block with debris and stuff everywhere, and dark rooms with the one you hear it in being lit only by fire and the TV that plays it. ALSO the fact that the TV was unplugged- very creepy.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
El_Chubba_Chubba:

There are only like 2 songs that are actually creepy in Half-Life 2, maybe 3. I doubt this thread is going to get very far.

I agree, most of the songs are like Adrenail pumpers or so to speed you up a bit

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think is the creepiest song?

item.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
item.dc:creator: 1_Wing_Angel
item.description:
During the part when you’re in the airboat and right after you see G-man on the ledge above you, there was a Resistance hidout on the left and it had a lot of headcrabs in it and the music was just windchimes and nothing else (with the exception of the headcrabs). Gave me chills after standing there for awhile.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think is the creepiest song?

item.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
item.dc:creator: awsgames
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Requiem for Ravenholm does that horrifying horn whine about six seconds in, certainly spookier than anything else I’ve heard musically.

Half-Life’s music isn’t so much creepy as it is reminiscent to the typical soundtrack to an episode of How it’s Made.

Man, I love that show.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think is the creepiest song?

item.title: What do you think is the creepiest song?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Jack:

What song in the Half Life series do you think is the creepiest? I’m voting for this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4b_CxSQ3r8U&feature=related

Requiem for Ravenholm does that horrifying horn whine about six seconds in, certainly spookier than anything else I’ve heard musically.

Half-Life’s music isn’t so much creepy as it is reminiscent to the typical soundtrack to an episode of How it’s Made.

Read full topic
